img_above_text:
![Copper Pill .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f0/Copper_Pill_.jpg)| Copper Pill| Epic | After using the gourd, the next Rock Solid cast costs no mana for a short duration | Found by a statue on the hill after the Tiger Vanguard fight at Crouching Tiger Temple - Temple Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge| Copper Pill
![Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/26/Black-myth-wukong-iron-pellet.jpg)| Iron Pellet| Rare | Using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks and now provides considerable Damage Reduction | Purchased from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge| Iron Pellet
img_below_text:
![Goat Skull .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f9/Goat_Skull_.jpg)| Goat Skull| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases maximum health for a short duration. | Chance to be found when picking up Licorice plants | Goat Skull
![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts the Iron Pellet, a rare item in the video game "Black Myth: Wukong." This item enhances gameplay by making the use of the gourd uninterrupted by attacks and provides significant damage reduction. It can be acquired by purchasing it from the Man-In-Stone after defeating him and completing his quest in Yellow Wind Ridge.
